skills.name: Expose Weakness
skills.description: Attacks an enemy and looks for its weakness. This attack decreases the enemy's Defense for 2 turns with a 50% chance.

skills.name: Death Verdict
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 2 times. Each attack has a 75% chance to leave a Brand for 2 turns. Enemies with a Brand will receive 25% increased damage.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +15%
Effect Rate +15%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Brand
skill_effect.description: Enemies with Branding Effect take 25% more Damage

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Silent Reaper
skills.description: Attacks and Silences the enemy for 2 turns. If the target dies, all other enemies will receive the remaining Silence Effect. The enemies under the Silence Effect won't be able to use skills with cooldown time excluding the passive skills.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Cooltime Turn -1
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Silence
skill_effect.description: Skills with cooltime are blocked for a number of turns
